name: Immortal Heroes
description:
You are a brave warrior who came to this world to save its inhabitants.
Here you will be met by awful monsters, such as huge spiders, wolf-werewolves, bears, unicorns ...
The essence of the game, like any clicker, is to quickly press the button to the finish.

Features:
- Nice graphics in the style of "drawing paints"
- Random generation of levels
- Atmospheric soundtrack
- Steam achievements
